name: Destination: Gravity
description:
Made For LD34 in 72 Hours with the theme "Two Buttons"

Ludum Dare Page

Story

The planet of Terranova has, for many millennia, been plagued by falling celestial bodies. Space debris, asteroids, fallen spacecraft, and the like. As a result, the Terranovians have invested great time and effort in the production of a technology powerful enough to prevent this debrid from coming into contact with the planet ever again.

You are the only remaining hope for Terranova. Equipped with a quazo-hyper gravity suit outfitted with hydraulic piston boots, you must deflect incoming detritus in order to change the fate of Terranova and all of it's inhabitants!

Controls

Left Arrow - Move Left

Right Arrow - Move Right

Left + Right Arrow - Jump/Double Jump/Teleport

R - Restart

Tools

Photoshop

C++ and SFML

Soundation

Audacity
